title: Depositions and Discovery
context: CHAPTER 624 DEPOSITIONS AND DISCOVERY Section 624-1, 2 Repealed 624-11 to 19 Repealed Part I. General Provisions 624-21 to 23 Repealed 624-24 Arbitrators, etc. 624-24.5 Compelling attendance of witness; commission for taking testimony 624-25 Discovery 624-25.5 Proceedings and records of peer review committees and quality assurance committees Part II. Depositions for Use Outside the State 624-26 Repealed 624-27 Subpoena to witness 624-28 Taking and return of deposition 624-31 to 34 Repealed Part III. Costs 624-35 Costs Part IV. Perpetuation of Testimony 624-41 Action for 624-42 to 44 Repealed 624-45 Costs Note Chapter heading amended by L 1972, c 143, §1(k). Rules of Court See HRCP chapter V and rules 45(d) and 81(g); HRPP rules 15, 16; DCRCP chapter V and rule 45(d); RCC rule 16; RDC rule 16; Hawaii Family Court Rules, part A(V). Law Journals and Reviews Pre-Trial Discovery: Change in the Federal Rules. 7 HBJ, no. 2, at 48 (1970). Electronic Discovery: A Call for a New Rules Regime for the Hawaii Courts. 32 UH L. Rev. 153 (2009).
